trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when Windows authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Angir identiteten til brukeren om en ASP.NET-programmet når Windows-godkjenning er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: When the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>, the WindowsAuthenticationModule sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the Windows identity supplied by IIS for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Når godkjenningen <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>, WindowsAuthenticationModule angir den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>til en <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet som representerer Windows-ID som er angitt av IIS for gjeldende forespørsel.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the WindowsAuthenticationModule uses the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IIS bruker for anonym godkjenning, vil WindowsAuthenticationModule bruker identiteten som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: WindowsAuthenticationModule viser en <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>hendelsen som gjør det mulig å angi et egendefinert <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objekt for <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>egenskapen for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>hendelsen brukes ved å angi en underrutine navnet **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** i filen Global.asax for ASP.NET-program.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the WindowsAuthenticationModule class with the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I IIS 7.0, ved hjelp av WindowsAuthenticationModule klassen med den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klassen støttes ikke.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om kompatibilitetsproblemer i integrert modus, se [flytter en ASP.NET-programmet fra IIS 6.0 til IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren skal ikke kalles fra programmet kode.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET kaller denne konstruktøren for å opprette en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>klassen.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall til konstruktøren, kaller den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>metode for å initialisere den nye <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>objektet.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når programmet godkjenner til gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenn denne hendelsen oppstår under den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can access the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til hendelsen Godkjenn for den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>klassen ved å angi en underrutine navnet **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** i filen Global.asax for ASP.NET-program.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>objektet som er angitt for den **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** -hendelsen for å angi den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>til en egendefinert <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>egenskapen under den **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen Windows identiteten som ble levert av IIS brukes som identitet for gjeldende forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IIS bruker for anonym godkjenning, og deretter den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>er satt til identiteten som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Den **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** hendelsen skjer bare når godkjenningen <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>og <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>er en aktive HTTP-modul for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0 running in Integrated Mode, the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is not raised when both the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> and the IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` modules are enabled.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I IIS 7.0 kjører i integrert modus, hendelsen Godkjenn for den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>oppstår ikke når både ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>og IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` moduler er aktivert.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> instance.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet for å motta varsel authentication abonnere på den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>hendelsen til den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om kompatibilitetsproblemer i integrert modus, se [flytter en ASP.NET-programmet fra IIS 6.0 til IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressurser enn minnet som brukes av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skal ikke kalles fra programmet kode.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skal ikke kalles fra programmet kode.

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Init-metoden sikrer at den <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>er inkludert i behandlingen av den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> forekomsten.
